content: january hat kitty-ears com things you need 1 75 100 125 200 yards of yarn i used knit picks brava 2 4 25mm crochet hook or hook for gauge terms used video tutorial here fpdc work a double_crochet st around the front post of a double_crochet st on the previous row st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 1 gauge working hat body repeat row in the round gauge is 3 5 stitches hori- zontally by 1 5 stitches per inch vertically 0-6m 6-12m 2-3y adult using the magic_ring method chain 2 and do 7 8 9 10 double_crochet into the loop slip_stitch to join chains like the ch2 do not count as stitches also you always fpdc the double_crochet from the previous round and double_crochet the fpdc from the previous rounds so you won t fpdc a st that has already been fpdc from a previous round please see video for visual representation r2 chain 2 *1dc 1 fpdc* around for 14 16 18 20 sts slip_stitch r3 chain 2 *1 double_crochet 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet * around for 21 24 27 30 sts slip_stitch r4 chain 2 *1fpdc 1 double_crochet 1fpdc 1dc* around for 28 32 36 40 sts slip_stitch r5 chain 2 *1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1fpdc 1 double_crochet 1fpdc* around for 35 40 45 50 sts slip_stitch r6 chain 2 *1fpdc 1dc 1fpdc 1dc 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet* around for 42 48 54 60 sts slip_stitch hat body you are done increasing so you will have 42 48 54 60 sts from here on out and that number will not change r1 chain 2 *1 double_crochet 1 fpdc* around you double_crochet the fpdc from previous round and fpdc the double_crochet from the previous round slip_stitch r2 chain 2 *1fpdc 1 double_crochet* around here you fpdc the double_crochet from r1 and double_crochet the fpdc from r1 slip_stitch repeat rounds 1-2 until hat measures 5 5 5 6 5 7 5 inches from top to rim counting the increase rounds or until hat is 1 inch from desired length you can end on a r1 or a r2 it does not matter i finish off with two-three rounds of half_double_crochet if you find your hat is a tad longer than you expected change the half_double_crochet to single_crochet so you don t have to tick back i do two row of half_double_crochet for the infant and toddler hats and three row for the adult hat r1 chain 1 half_double_crochet all sts slip_stitch r2 ch1 half_double_crochet all sts slip_stitch repeat round two for adult hat size twice cut yarn and weave in all ends add a fun pom pom and wear 2 ravelry need help with a pattern i am always willing to help with a small child it may take awhile
